entries.title: Second Brain System Development and Knowledge Management
entries.summary: Comprehensive development of the Second Brain system including server deployment, cron job automation, intelligent knowledge synthesis, tag management, and knowledge graph visualization. The system captures conversations, processes them into structured knowledge entries, prevents tag fragmentation, and provides web-based access to both raw conversations and distilled knowledge. Key topics include: server deployment for public access, cron job configuration and troubleshooting, intelligent synchronization mechanisms, and knowledge organization strategies. The intelligent sync task follows precise specifications: data source analysis from raw-conversations.json, intelligent processing with English-only content generation, knowledge base updates with proper file synchronization, comprehensive system maintenance including server health checks, and rigorous quality assurance protocols to ensure frontend accessibility and proper content display.

entries.title: Chinese Metaphysics: Twenty-Four Solar Terms and I Ching Connections
entries.summary: Exploration of the deep philosophical connections between the Twenty-Four Solar Terms and the I Ching (Book of Changes). Both systems share common foundations in yin-yang theory, the concept of 'heaven-human correspondence', five elements integration, and cyclical time concepts. The relationship demonstrates ancient Chinese holistic thinking that unified astronomy, philosophy, agriculture, and practical applications. Key connections include temporal correspondence between solar terms and hexagrams, Five Elements integration, and practical applications in agriculture, health, and feng shui.

entries.title: 2026 Spring Festival Movie Guide
entries.summary: Comprehensive guide to the 2026 Chinese Spring Festival movie lineup, featuring 8 major releases: 'Pegasus 3', 'Blade Runner: Desert Storm', 'Silent Awakening', 'Boonie Bears: Year After Year', 'Dreaming of the Stars', 'Panda Plan: Tribal Adventure', 'Return to the Wolf Pack' (re-release), and 'Night King'. The lineup spans multiple genres including animation, action, thriller, and science fiction, catering to diverse audience preferences during the extended Spring Festival holiday period.

entries.title: Embodied Intelligence: Global Developments and 2026 Breakthroughs
entries.summary: Comprehensive analysis of embodied intelligence (embodied AI) developments worldwide, with focus on 2026 breakthroughs, current bottlenecks, and emerging trends. The research covers technical challenges in data collection, model hallucination issues, hardware-software integration difficulties, and recent innovations in world models and VLA (Vision-Language-Action) architectures. Includes insights into China's specific contributions including force/tactile feedback systems, multi-modal perception devices, and standardization efforts, while maintaining a global perspective on this rapidly evolving field.

entries.title: Second Brain Intelligent Sync Task Execution and System Maintenance
entries.summary: Detailed execution of the Second Brain Intelligent Sync Task scheduled via cron job. This process involves precise data source analysis from raw-conversations.json, intelligent processing with English-only content generation, comprehensive knowledge base updates with proper file synchronization across data/knowledge-db.json, content/notes/, and content/logs/ directories, thorough system maintenance including server health checks and automatic restart when needed, and rigorous quality assurance protocols. The sync task ensures all conversations are properly captured, processed into structured knowledge entries with consistent tagging, and made accessible through the web frontend with complete, non-truncated English content. The system maintains detailed execution logs and continuously monitors server uptime and API functionality. Recent executions have demonstrated reliable automated processing with proper error handling and system recovery capabilities.
